about_the_game:
*This is a VR-only app that runs on SteamVR.

An application that lets you lay down roads, this is your future non-fictional story.

These objects will be programmed when you place them on the road.

Placing cardboard that has the name of an image file will display that image.
Placing cardboard and adding a note to it will display the message in the note.
Placing a calculator with a mathematical expression attached to it will evaluate that expression.

In other words, just putting these objects on the road will program them, creating an application.


"Is this for people who are good at programming and math and stuff?"

We hear you ask. Or:

"Drawing is hard, though. I can't do it, lol."

Or

"You're a programmer, right? Bring me your PC."

Well, you couldn't be more wrong.

You don't need to have an in-depth knowledge of programming.


All we'll say is that programming is the magic of the computing world.

Now, use whatever magic you like, and craft a human story that's unforgettable.

We encourage you to make let's plays and live streams!!
(However, doing so will be your own responsiblity.)

Place the Model and try running it.
Also, try placing and moving the Model.
Please see the Manual or Tutorial for details.
The click button differs depending on the VR controller, so please try it out.


[Contents]
Manual (HTML file)
Sample (Contains a number of Carp and rice files)
Readme(EN).txt (Text file)
Readme(Jp).txt (Text file)
Carp
detailed_description:
*This is a VR-only app that runs on SteamVR.

An application that lets you lay down roads, this is your future non-fictional story.

These objects will be programmed when you place them on the road.

Placing cardboard that has the name of an image file will display that image.
Placing cardboard and adding a note to it will display the message in the note.
Placing a calculator with a mathematical expression attached to it will evaluate that expression.

In other words, just putting these objects on the road will program them, creating an application.


"Is this for people who are good at programming and math and stuff?"

We hear you ask. Or:

"Drawing is hard, though. I can't do it, lol."

Or

"You're a programmer, right? Bring me your PC."

Well, you couldn't be more wrong.

You don't need to have an in-depth knowledge of programming.


All we'll say is that programming is the magic of the computing world.

Now, use whatever magic you like, and craft a human story that's unforgettable.

We encourage you to make let's plays and live streams!!
(However, doing so will be your own responsiblity.)

Place the Model and try running it.
Also, try placing and moving the Model.
Please see the Manual or Tutorial for details.
The click button differs depending on the VR controller, so please try it out.

developers: ストロングツリー(HusHucHu ライス)
name: CarprogramVR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7 SP1+, Windows10, Windows 11
  • Storage: 405 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus, Mock HMD Loader, OpenVR Loader, SteamVR

short_description: An application that lets you lay down roads, this is your future non-fictional story. *This is a VR-only app that runs on SteamVR.
